title: Set up Stage for a Concert
description: The operations crew needs to set up the stage, lighting, and sound system for a touring concert.

tasks.description: Review the artist's technical rider for all stage, sound, and lighting requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts the detailed technical specifications.

tasks.description: Create work orders for the in-house lighting and sound technicians.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates detailed work orders for the technical teams.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the tour's production manager to ensure a smooth load-in and setup process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with the tour manager to align on the schedule.
